trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for all management query objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供所有管理查询对象的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象。

trans-unit.source: Parses the query string and sets the property values accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 分析查询字符串，并相应地设置属性值。

trans-unit.source: If the query is valid, the class name property and condition property of the query will be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 如果查询是有效时，将分析的类名称属性和查询的条件属性。

trans-unit.source: ## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: ##.NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The query string to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 要分析的查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the query language used in the query string, defining the format of the query string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置查询字符串，定义查询字符串的格式中使用的查询语言。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value Can be set to any supported query language.
trans-unit.target: ##属性值可以设置为任何支持的查询语言。

trans-unit.source: "WQL" is the only value supported intrinsically by WMI.
trans-unit.target: "WQL"是唯一的 WMI 本质上支持的值。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the format of the query string.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>值，该值包含查询字符串的格式。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the query in text format.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置文本格式的查询。

trans-unit.source: ## Property Value If the query object is constructed with no parameters, the property is null until specifically set.
trans-unit.target: ##属性值的查询对象构造不带任何参数，该属性为 null 直到专门设置。

trans-unit.source: If the object was constructed with a specified query, the property returns the specified query string.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象使用指定的查询构造的该属性将返回指定的查询字符串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 安全完全信任直接调用方。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> value containing the query.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.String>值包含的查询。</xref:System.String>
